description:
Play the #1 free golf game and top-rated 3D sports game, featuring famous realistic golf courses like Pebble Beach and St Andrews from the PGA Tour. Single and multiplayer full stroke play and closest-to-the-hole games. World Golf Tour players can use their existing web accounts and virtual golf equipment. Requires a fast internet connection with iPad 2 or iPhone 4 and later. Supports iPad 2 or later, iPhone 4/5/6 or later, and iPad Touch 5 or later. Does not support iPad 1, iPhone 3 or iPad Touch 4.

WGT Golf Mobile includes...

* Golf Courses – over a dozen championship golf courses, including: Bethpage (2009 USGA U.S. Open), Celtic Manor (2010 Ryder Cup), Congressional (2011 USGA US Open), Harbour Town (PGA RBC Heritage), Kiawah (2012 PGA Championship), Merion (2013 USGA US Open), Olympic Club (2012 USGA U.S. Open), Pebble Beach (2010 USGA US Open), Pinehurst (2014 USGA US Open), St Andrews (2015 British Open), and Valhalla (2014 PGA Championship)

* Golf Simulator – swing, drive, chip and putt using different golf shots from different lies on the tee, fairway, rough, bunkers and greens in this realistic 3d golf simulation

* Game Formats - full stroke play and closest-to-the hole golf games and golf brackets

* Head-to-Head Multiplayer Mode - play real-time quick stroke play golf games against your friends and other players, chat live and learn how to play

* Friends List - Make new friends, invite them to join you to play and chat with them on the course

* Country Club - join a private country club, make new friends, play in club tournaments, and earn special club rewards

* Golf Tournaments - special tournaments with sports bets and prizes including the WGT Virtual Tour on Golf Channel and paid Ready-Go tournaments

* Golf Equipment - upgraded virtual golf clubs and golf balls from Callaway, Cobra, Ping, TaylorMade and other top sports equipment manufacturers

* Golf Accessories – popular options like Putter Pal, Shot Pal, XP Boost, Level-Up Boost, Hole-in-One challenges and more

* Replays - share your best golf shots with friends via Facebook, Twitter or email via Everyplay

* Support - Supports iPad 2 or later, iPhone 4, 5 and 6 or later, and iPad Touch 5 or later. Does not support iPad 1, iPhone 3 or iPad Touch 4.
releaseNotes:
* Invite your friends to head-to-head games
* Improved head-to-head game performance/chat
* Choose male/female and right/left-handed avatars
* Streamlined registration for new players
